body:
Hello!
My name is Girly_Gamer2006, and I don't remember ANYTHING about avicus, really how do I get in TeamSpeak! and I got banned for no reason! so I would like to know how do I get in TeamSpeak! Does someone have a clue?
body_tagged:
Hello!
My name is Girly_Gamer2006, and I don't remember ANYTHING about avicus, really how do I get in TeamSpeak! and I got banned for no reason! so I would like to know how do I get in TeamSpeak! Does someone have a clue?
title: Hello!

replies.body:
Hello!
The TS IP is ts.avicus.net.
And you got banned for ban evading, which means you are tempbanned/banned on another account but you join with another that isn't banned.
replies.body_tagged:
Hello!
The TS IP is ts.avicus.net.
And you got banned for ban evading, which means you are tempbanned/banned on another account but you join with another that isn't banned.

replies.body:
You can appeal in "Appeal an Infraction"
But there was wrote that you are alternative of Serena. You have evased your temp-ban. It causes permanent ban :/

replies.body: I didin't and now I know the reason why im banned because I need to prove I'm separate people from Serena_Lovheart.

replies.body: Have her come on the same time as you.
